mapper.insert: insert into cart(CARTID, MID, pno, cartCount) values(CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MID}, #{pno}, #{cartCount})
mapper.update: update cart set pstock=#{pstock} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.*, p.*, c.cartId, c.cartCount, m.MID, p.pno, p.pname, p.pprice FROM cart c INNER JOIN zebra m ON c.MID = m.MID INNER JOIN product p ON c.pno = p.pno where m.MID = #{MID}
select * from cart where MID = #{MID} and pno = #{pno}
mapper.update: update cart set ONO = #{ONO} where MID=#{MID} and cartId=#{cartId}
